author: COMSOL
description: The way you swing a golf club influences the outcome of the stroke. This example presents a multibody analysis of a golf swing aiming to maximize the club head speed just prior to the impact with the ball. The wrist torque, which has an important role to play in improving the outcome of the stroke, is varied parametrically to see its effect on the club head speed.
label: golf_swing_mechanics.mph
